website_summaries.verdict: Pricey, but with with a unique construction that’s ultra-strong, smudge-resistant, and easy to apply, you’ll be hard pressed to find a better screen protector for your Nintendo Switch.
pros: Made of Glass+, which incorporates an innovative processing technique to add strength on a molecular level
Resists dents, scratches, cracks, and shattering
Oil-resistant surface combats fingerprints and smudges, and is easier to keep clean than most
Features EZ tabs for hassle-free application without bubbles or creases

customer_reviews.title: nice it left glue residue on the screen
customer_reviews.text: part of the cleaning process was to remove fine dust particles after using the wet wipe and cloth. it left glue residue on the screen which was hard to clean off. i thought it damaged the screen. using alcohol, i was able to remove the residue which was hard to see. trail and error. the error was trying to apply the screen when not all the residue was not removed, hard to see. cleaning it and trying again after several attempts, the screen protector ended up with glue residue and in the trash. thanks for wasting my 30 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Tersteeg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THE DUST REMOVAL STICKER
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector is 5 stars. Why I’m only giving 3 stars is because of the dust removal sticker. That is 1 star, no, ZERO STARS! It left a ton of glue residue on my switch..... I had to literally scrub it off. I thought I was gonna break the screen. That shit should NOT be induced. It’s too sticky to work properly. AND I still got dust under the protector after the whole ordeal. I will still buy ZAGG products, but I will NEVER use that thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the dust remover sticker.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason not worth 5 stars is the sticky dust remover left difficult to remove glue on the screen. Thus making it even more of a hassle to apply the protector.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Zagg is top of line.
customer_reviews.text: I love Zagg products. I use them on all of my devices. iPhones, surface pro. When I got the switch I immediately looked for a zagg screen protector. I perfect the tempered glass over the hd screens. Additionally lifetime warranty is real. No secrets to it.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Protector Ever. An Absolute Beauty.
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I've purchased several different screen protectors and wasted my money as each one had scratches on them and were horrible quality, even licensed nintendo ones. I remember I bought a Zagg one for my phone and it works well so I was like sure. If you're looking for a screen protector, this might be the one for you. From my experience with this one, it looks awesome, you cannot even tell it is there! I'm so happy with this. Although I haven't had it very long, but I do trust Zagg's quality so it'll be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item with questionable service
customer_reviews.text: This particular zagg works great, my only real issue is that when I went to a zagg location to have this put on, not only was the application not free as it was supposed to be for a first time, they had also raised their service fees from $8 to $10 without giving any notice to people with screens already under warranty
customer_reviews.author: bzybee

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This screen glass screen protector by Zagg makes my Nintendo Switch look and feel more high premium quality product.Easy install no bubbles and easy cleaning awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Isaias Depaz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was promised - I mean it's a ZAGG product!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, clear display. You don't even know it's on. Lots of experience with Zagg products. We love ZAGG. They are the best and you can't beat their warranty. Just remember to register your product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Kay

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Great product and warranty. I use ZAGG products to protect all of my devices.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product instillation took less than 3 minutes and looks great no bubbles. A little pricey but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for probably about a year or more now. Still no scratches or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Item came damaged, protector was cracked. Horrible experience. I used ZAGG before on my phone and I had a good experience so I was not expecting this at all. UPDATE: THEY ARE MAKING ME SHIP THE BROKEN ITEM BACK even with the Corona Virus situation. This is insane.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: One corner didn't go down, had professionally applied.
customer_reviews.text: One corner didn't want to go down and I went to a cell phone store to have the screen professional applied. They said the sticker to remove dust was worthless and they used their own sticker which I could tell has less 'gluey' substance/residue.
customer_reviews.author: Mekkor

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t happy
customer_reviews.text: Installation was stupid, and wound up messing up the protector. Not as easy as it was in the past
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE THE INCLUDED STICKER! Great product but the sticker leaves glue residue on the screen that is extremely hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: trich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my switch and now I don’t have to keep using the “fake” plastic film that’s been trying to hold up on my screen. Love the ZAGG products
customer_reviews.author: Brian Roth

customer_reviews.title: Get one to protect the screen!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great screen protector for the switch, I recommend buying one, especially if you’re very active on it.
customer_reviews.author: Emiliano Llave

customer_reviews.title: Useful & Smart
customer_reviews.text: The last thing you want is to pay a lot of money for a hand held game, then have it ruined by dropping it and breaking the screen. This protector was easy to apply, fit perfectly, and gives me a sense of security should the game be dropped. It has been dropped, by the way, and my screen is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: MOshopper

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use Zagg screen protectors on all of my devices. It’s nice because when it gets a chip, or crack (which has not happened often) all I have to pay for is the shipping to replace my product!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Klontz

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: My switch screen protector came in from the warehouse already cracked and missing the alcohol wipe to clean my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Love

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits into Dock with no issue. Cant even tell it's there, hasn't held a scratch yet. Zagg always has the best screen protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zagg is reliable as always!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for my phones for a couple years now and they've always been super reliable. Their screen for the switch is no different!
customer_reviews.author: Billie-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but spendy
customer_reviews.text: I like Zagg, it's just high priced, but in long run it may be ok, cuz you can get replacement for ship cost only
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Gsrbage product
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage got it to fit bubbles everywhere doesnt come with a thing to remove them. Once you remove it instant lint dont waste the money. Buy a cheapo 8 dollar one at Wal-Mart or something
customer_reviews.author: Hoosk

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Two months and I dont have a scratch on the screen protector. It is super smooth and you can't really tell it is on there. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best screen protector ever
customer_reviews.text: We have many products from zag. We will never use any other glass protector. They have a lifetime warranty so if it cracks all you do is pay for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Seems to be doing its job
customer_reviews.author: mkb

customer_reviews.title: Easy application and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super easy application, pretty durable so far and doesnt affect touchscreen. Comes with a warranty and everything. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: amazing screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can even see it on and it doesn't blur the screen in any way. Amazing product, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Covers my screen and doesn't effect the touch screen capabilities of my switch at all.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: best brand for screen protectors!
customer_reviews.text: tried something else because it was cheaper and boy could you tell the difference! i immediately took it off and ordered a zagg! easy to apply, any bubbles disappear after applying pressure and it looks great on. haven't had any drops or scratches yet, but if it's anything like their other screen protectors i'm sure i'll never have to worry about it. cannot recommend zagg enough
customer_reviews.author: dar

customer_reviews.title: Protected and clean
customer_reviews.text: Zagg always does the job. Went on easily and even came with the supplies to clean the screen beforehand. Don’t know why I didn’t get it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have to worry about scratches on the screen anymore
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love Zagg products. I use Zagg on all my devices this is a little pricey compared to some other brands but the quality is well worth it. This screen protector will last a long time for sure
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, I was super nervous about putting this on myself. But it was very easy and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ree H.

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great, just make sure to follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great, just make sure to follow the instructions, review below this one is not for this product, this tempered glass is not $12. For the price there should be another one included in the box, got some dust under my first attempt and tried pulling it back up, bad idea, it won’t reseal afterwords. Had to pay another $5.99 to get a warranty repair. Expensive but nice screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Phone Man

customer_reviews.title: I threw my switch to the wall
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this really works. I got into an argument with my significant other and regretally threw my switch into the wall and it survived. The protector did shattered but the actual switch screen was still intact. My joycon was also damage but was fixable. Guess I'm buy another screen protector....
customer_reviews.author: ILEE

customer_reviews.title: Dust remover can destroy screen.
customer_reviews.text: The dust remover is a screen destroyer. It is so sticky I pulled the screen off my Iphone 7 Plus. I will be going to one of those places that replace smartphone screens to replace it. 99 bucks. What a stupid company Zagg is. Who in the heck do they hire in their engineering department?
customer_reviews.author: Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Don't use Dust Removal Sticker
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector itself is great, which is the only reason why this isn't 1 star, but the Dust Removal Sticker left glue residue on my Switch that was not easy to remove. Why would you include something that obviously does not work? It takes literally 2 seconds in QA testing the sticker to see that it should NOT be part of the product. Use Isopropyl alcohol and q-tips to clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Agolli

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and I had no issues with bubbles. I saw a few videos on Youtube to make sure I was following instructions. Shield looks great. I will agree that it is pricey. I hope Warranty makes up for it in the long run, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: I am fully gruntled
customer_reviews.text: This protector was easy to apply and included cleaning supplies to prep the screen. It installed with no bubbles and looks like it will work out fine. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Derek S

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. First of all they have you use some application gel adhesive primer which is not even mentioned in their installation video. I slightly misplaced a part of the protector and pulled it out after that forget it. It won't work and had lots of air pockets. I just threw 12$ in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: gb

product_meta.title: ZAGG InvisibleShield Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Glass+ is created with a proprietary process that strengthens the material on a molecular level. Resistant to dents and shattering, Glass+ protects your screen from daily life. Its oil-resistant design allows Glass+ to repel fingerprints and smudges. Glass+ is easy to clean, keeping your screen bright and vibrant. The patented EZ apply tabs make it simple to apply your screen protector. Glass+ is self-applying to prevent creases and bubbles and ensure full-screen coverage. If your Invisible Shield Glass+ ever gets worn or damaged, ZAGG will replace it as long as you own your device. With this worry-free warranty, screen damage won't stand a chance.
feature_bullets: ION MATRIX IMPACT PROTECTION - Glass+ is created with a proprietary process that strengthens the material on a molecular level. Resistant to dents and shattering.
SMUDGE & FINGERPRINT RESISTANT - Its oil-resistant design allows Glass+ to repel fingerprints and smudges. Glass+ is easy to clean, keeping your screen bright and vibrant
EASY, BUBBLE-FREE APPLICATION - The patented EZ apply tabs make it simple to apply your screen protector. Glass+ is self-applying to prevent creases and bubbles and ensure full-screen coverage
LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY - If your Invisible Shield Glass+ ever gets worn or damaged, ZAGG will replace it as long as you own your device.
